item.description: Stuck Elevator; INC#0760; 12:14PM; 7s Lax; MAP: https://bit.ly/3gJxdRD; Westchester; A power outage at the Los Angeles International Airport has resulted in over a dozen "stuck elevator" calls since approximately 11:30AM. There are no reported injuries and the exact number of persons trapped is not known. Firefighters are continuing to address any stuck elevators throughout the facility. Any media questions regarding the power outage are referred to LAWA officials. No further details. (This incident number is being used for the command team on site running the incident while the individual 'stuck elevator' calls each carry their own incident number); FS 51; Batt 4; West Bureau; Council District 11; BC4 E264 T64; CH7; Margaret Stewart

Update Structure Fire; INC#1312; 07:17PM; 18540 W Collins St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3F3DOQr; Tarzana; A total of two patients were transport: One patient (27 yo F) in fair condition with possible smoke inhalation. One patient 45yo F (unknown condition) with unspecified injuries. No further details.; FS 93; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 3; AR1 BC15 BC17 CM40 CM42 E100 E273 E288 E293 E83 E84 E90 E93 EA1 EM17 RA100 RA84 RA88 RA96 T73 T88 T93; CH8; 17; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1312; 06:49PM; 18540 W Collins St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3F3DOQr; Tarzana; KNOCKDOWN: 55 firefighters fully extinguished the fire in 23 minutes. There are a total of four units involved in the fire (extent of damage of each unit is not available at this time). A primary and secondary search found no occupants in any of the units. The four persons (two children, two adults) who were brought down from the 2nd floor balcony (via fire department ladder) are being assessed for any injuries. Cause and $ loss TBD. No further details.; FS 93; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 3; BC15 BC17 CM40 CM42 E100 E273 E288 E293 E83 E84 E90 E93 EA1 EM17 RA100 RA84 RA88 RA96 T73 T88 T93; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart

Update Structure Fire; INC#1312; 06:47PM; 18540 W Collins St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3F3DOQr; Tarzana; A total of four occupants safely descended a ladder raised by firefighters to their balcony (two children and two adults). They are being assessed by firefighter/paramedics. Firefighters have made good progress and initial reports are of four units being involved in the fire.; FS 93; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 3; BC15 BC17 CM40 CM42 E100 E273 E288 E293 E83 E84 E93 EM17 RA100 RA84 RA88 T73 T88 T93; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart

Update Structure Fire; INC#1312; 06:26PM; 18540 W Collins St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3F3DOQr; Tarzana; Building type is updated to a two story, garden style apartment building. There are 2-3 units involved in fire with two occupants being rescued off an adjacent balcony with a ladder (they are in a safe location with no injuries). ; FS 93; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 3; BC15 BC17 CM40 CM42 E100 E273 E288 E293 E83 E84 E93 EM17 RA100 RA84 RA88 T73 T88 T93; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#1312; 06:26PM; 18540 W Collins St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3F3DOQr; Tarzana; Two story, center hall apartment building with moderate smoke showing. Firefighters are in the offensive mode. Additional task force requested (reflected in this alert).; FS 93; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 3; BC15 BC17 CM42 E100 E273 E288 E293 E83 E84 E93 EM17 RA100 RA84 RA88 T73 T88 T93; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0514; 10:08AM; 6320 E Ruby St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3GHYm29; Highland Park; KNOCKDOWN: 32 firefighters achieved full extinguishment in 21 minutes with no injuries reported. Firefighters encountered significant storage within the attic which delayed their ability to reach the seat of the fire. Additional crews conducted salvage operations on the interior (which remained clear of fire) to protect belongings from water/smoke damage. There was a roofing operation underway at the time of the fire. Official cause and $ loss TBD. No further details.; FS 12; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC2 E12 E201 E212 E42 E44 E55 RA12 T1 T12; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0514; 09:47AM; 6320 E Ruby St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3GHYm29; Highland Park; One story, single family dwelling with fire showing from converted attic with an additional structure exposed. One more task force requested. Firefighters are in the offensive mode.; FS 12; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC2 E12 E212 E42 E55 RA12 T12; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1727; 09:37PM; 439 N Sierra Bonita Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3V7cC8K; #Fairfax; It took 22 LAFD firefighters just 18 minutes to access, confine, and extinguish flames on the second floor of at two-story duplex. No reported injuries. The cause of the fire is under investigation.; FS 61; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 5; BC18 E227 E229 E261 E41 E52 RA41 RA861 T27 T29 T61; CH9; 13; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#1727; 09:37PM; 439 N Sierra Bonita Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3V7cC8K; #Fairfax; Two-story four-plex with smoke showing. Offensive mode.; FS 61; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 5; BC18 E227 E261 E41 RA41 RA861 T27 T61; CH9; 13; Nicholas Prange
